item.title: 全球首个仿人机器人半程马拉松赛因大风天气推迟举行
item.description: 北京推迟了原定于周日举行的半程马拉松比赛，在这场比赛中，仿人机器人将与人类选手并肩作战，这是一场里程碑式的比赛，旨在展示中国在前沿产业领域取得的进步。【原文：Beijing has postponed a half marathon originally scheduled for Sunday in which humanoid robots will race alongside human runners, a milestone designed to showcase China's advances in a frontier industry the country is intent on dominating.】

item.title: 瑞银股东以 90% 的选票再次选举科尔姆-凯莱赫为主席
item.description: 瑞银股东周四以 90% 的选票再次选举科尔姆-凯莱赫（Colm Kelleher）为主席，而 2024 年的得票率为 96%。【原文：UBS shareholders on Thursday reelected Chairman Colm Kelleher with 90% of votes, compared to 96% of votes in 2024.】

item.title: 英国监管机构称可能接受 SLB 和 ChampionX 提出的补救措施
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周四表示，可能会接受油田服务公司 SLB 和规模较小的竞争对手 ChampionX 提出的措施，以解决两家公司拟议的 80 亿美元交易中的反垄断问题。【原文：Britain's competition regulator said on Thursday it might accept the measures offered by oilfield services firm SLB and smaller rival ChampionX to address antitrust concerns regarding the two companies' proposed $8 billion deal.】

item.title: 早间竞标再猜测九十天
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 亚马逊首席执行官在年度股东信中阐述人工智能投资使命
item.description: 亚马逊首席执行官安迪-贾西（Andy Jassy）周四为公司数十亿美元的人工智能开发支出进行了辩解，称这项投资是保持竞争力所必需的。【原文：Amazon chief executive Andy Jassy on Thursday justified the company's billions of dollars in outlays for artificial intelligence development, saying the investment was necessary to remain competitive.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Polestar 的季度销售额因优惠和折扣而猛增
item.description: 周四，电动汽车制造商 Polestar 的第一季度销售额猛增 76%，原因是折扣和优惠帮助抵消了激烈的竞争和不确定的经济前景。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Polestar's first-quarter sales jumped 76% on Thursday as discounts and offers helped offset stiff competition and an uncertain economic outlook.】

item.title: 意法半导体寻求就投资和就业水平向意大利作出保证
item.description: 芯片制造商意法半导体（STMicroelectronics）周四向意大利保证其对意大利的承诺，因为罗马政府向该公司首席执行官施加了辞职压力。【原文：Chipmaker STMicroelectronics moved on Thursday to reassure Italy of its commitment to the country as the Rome government puts pressure on the company's chief executive to quit.】

item.title: 瑞银股东以 86.7% 的票数支持 2024 年薪酬报告
item.description: 在周四的咨询投票中，瑞银股东以 86.7% 的票数支持该行 2024 年的薪酬报告，而去年同期的支持率为 83.5%。【原文：In an advisory vote, UBS shareholders on Thursday backed the bank's 2024 compensation report with 86.7% of votes, compared to 83.5% for the same report a year earlier.】

item.title: 解说员：美国国债市场刚刚发生了什么？
item.description: 一周前，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）决定暂停他曾表示要对数十个国家征收的巨额关税，随后金融市场出现动荡，包括 29 万亿美元的国债市场急剧下挫。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's decision to pause the hefty duties he had said he would impose on dozens of countries one week ago followed turmoil in financial markets that included an acute selloff in the $29 trillion Treasury market.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官陈立武在中国的广泛投资
item.description: 英特尔首席执行官陈立武数十年来通过他于 1987 年在旧金山创立的风险投资公司华登国际和两家香港控股公司，对中国公司进行了数百次投资。【原文：Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan has made hundreds of investments in Chinese companies over decades through Walden International, the San Francisco venture capital firm he founded in 1987, and two Hong Kong-based holding companies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行称关税不确定性下决定利率路径为时尚早
item.description: 澳大利亚最高央行行长周四表示，现在决定利率路径还为时过早，并补充说在评估美国贸易政策对经济的影响时需要保持耐心，因为这些政策已经颠覆了金融市场。【原文：Australia's top central banker said on Thursday that it was still too early to decide on the path for interest rates, adding it needed to be patient as it assesses the economic impact of U.S. trade policies that have upended financial markets.】

item.title: 聚焦：华尔街对关税冲击的反应：客户来电和奖金担忧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布征收最新关税后，市场暴跌，花旗集团银行业主管维斯瓦斯-拉加万（Viswas Raghavan）周一召集全球高级银行家开会，让他们与客户通电话。【原文：With markets crashing after U.S. President Donald Trump announced his latest tariffs, Citigroup’s banking head Viswas Raghavan called a global meeting of senior bankers on Monday and told them to get on the phone with their clients.】

item.title: 洞察：英特尔首席执行官投资了数百家中国公司，其中一些与军事有关
item.description: 根据路透社对中国和美国公司文件的审查，被选中领导美国最大芯片制造商英特尔的陈立武投资了数百家中国科技公司，其中至少有八家与中国人民解放军有关联。【原文：Lip-Bu Tan, the man chosen to lead Intel, the U.S.'s largest chip maker, has invested in hundreds of Chinese tech firms, including at least eight with links to the People's Liberation Army, according to a Reuters review of Chinese and U.S. corporate filings.】

item.title: 迪拜的 Mashreq 公司将与高盛集团合作，为富裕客户提供服务
item.description: 总部位于迪拜的 Mashreq 公司与高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）建立了合作伙伴关系，以提供全权委托投资服务，满足海湾地区对专业管理投资组合日益增长的需求。【原文：Dubai-based Mashreq has entered a partnership with Goldman Sachs Asset Management to offer discretionary investment services and tap growing demand for professionally managed portfolios in the Gulf.】

item.title: 市场反弹，全球信用违约利差收窄
item.description: 周四，欧洲和亚洲主权债务和企业债务违约保险成本下降，原因是美国暂停征收部分最重关税，令投资者松了一口气。【原文：The cost of insuring against sovereign and corporate defaults on European and Asian debt fell on Thursday as investors breathed a sigh of relief at a pause on some of the heaviest U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 巴里-卡乐宝将扩大美国生产规模以应对 "破坏性环境
item.description: 瑞士巧克力制造商巴里-卡乐堡（Barry Callebaut）首席执行官周四表示，该公司正计划增加在美国的生产，以抵御北美 "破坏性环境 "的影响，并贴近客户。【原文：Barry Callebaut is planning to increase its U.S.-based production to fend off effects of the "disruptive environment" in North America and stay close to its customers, the Swiss chocolate maker's chief executive said on Thursday.】

item.title: 因特朗普关税逆转而大幅反弹后期货下跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）暂时降低对数十个国家征收的高额关税，同时提高对中国的征税，在引发了令人瞠目的涨势一天之后，美国股指期货周四下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Thursday, a day after an eye-watering rally set off by U.S. President Donald Trump's move to temporarily lower the heavy tariffs on dozens of countries, while raising the levies on China.】

item.title: 乌克兰副总理表示，美国和乌克兰将于周五就矿产交易展开会谈
item.description: 乌克兰副总理奥尔哈-斯特凡尼希娜（Olha Stefanishyna）周四表示，美国和乌克兰将于周五在华盛顿就矿产交易展开技术磋商，磋商不会干扰基辅的其他财政承诺。【原文：Technical consultations between the U.S. and Ukraine on a minerals deal will begin in Washington on Friday and will not interfere with Kyiv's other financial commitments, Ukrainian Deputy Prime Minister Olha Stefanishyna said on Thursday.】

item.title: 谷歌部署人工智能，加快美国最大电网 PJM 的连接速度
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司（Google）周四表示，该公司正在与北美最大的电网运营商PJM互联公司（PJM Interconnection）合作，推出人工智能技术，旨在更快地连接新的电力供应。【原文：Alphabet Inc's Google unit is partnering with the largest electrical grid operator in North America, PJM Interconnection, to roll out artificial intelligence technologies aimed at getting new power supplies connected faster, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 宝马第一季度电池电动汽车交付量猛增三分之一
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司周四表示，今年第一季度的电池电动汽车销量增加了约三分之一。【原文：German carmaker BMW said on Thursday that it sold around a third more battery electric vehicles in the first quarter of the year.】

item.title: 特朗普不断升级的关税有可能逆转美国的进口热潮
item.description: 贸易高管们表示，3月份美国集装箱进口同比增长11%，延续了今年以来的月度超高增幅，但美国总统唐纳德-特朗普不断升级的关税正在使今年晚些时候的前景变得暗淡。【原文：U.S. container imports rose 11% year over year in March, continuing this year's outsized monthly gains, but U.S. President Donald Trump's escalating tariffs are dimming the outlook for later this year, trade executives said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，苹果从印度空运 600 吨 iPhone "以抵御 "特朗普关税
item.description: 消息人士告诉路透社，科技巨头苹果公司在印度加强生产以抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税之后，包租货运航班从印度向美国运送 600 吨或多达 150 万部 iPhone。【原文：Tech giant Apple chartered cargo flights to ferry 600 tons of iPhones, or as many as 1.5 million, to the United States from India, after it stepped up production there in an effort to beat President Donald Trump's tariffs, sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 汇丰任命理查德-布莱克本（Richard Blackburn）为首席风险与合规官
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）周四表示，已任命理查德-布莱克本（Richard Blackburn）为集团首席风险与合规官，并确认了他自今年 1 月以来临时担任的职务。【原文：HSBC has appointed Richard Blackburn as group chief risk and compliance officer, the bank said on Thursday, confirming him in a role he has held on an interim basis since January.】

item.title: 中国 Leapmotor 提供免费智能驾驶软件
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商飞跃汽车公司（Leapmotor）周四表示，将为配备驾驶辅助功能的车型提供免费的智能驾驶软件。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Leapmotor said on Thursday that it would offer free smart driving software on models with driver assistance features.】

item.title: 尽管面临资本变动和全球不确定性，瑞银仍坚持 30 亿美元的股票回购计划
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）主席科尔姆-凯莱赫（Colm Kelleher）周四重申，尽管资本规则变化迫在眉睫，全球经济也存在不确定性，但该瑞士银行仍打算在2025年回购30亿美元的股票。【原文：UBS Chairman Colm Kelleher on Thursday reiterated the Swiss bank's intention to repurchase shares to the tune of $3 billion in 2025, despite looming capital rule changes and global economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会表示将就关税问题的下一步措施与成员国进行磋商
item.description: 欧盟委员会表示，它将花费必要的时间来评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三宣布暂停征收美国关税一事。【原文：The European Commission said it will take the necessary time to assess US President Donald Trump's announcement on Wednesday about a pause in US tariffs.】

item.title: 意法半导体监事会否认内幕交易指控
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics）监事会周四否认了有关两名董事会成员进行内幕交易的指控。【原文：STMicroelectronics' supervisory board on Thursday denied allegations of insider trading concerning two member of its managing board.】

item.title: 据报道，Kering 正在洽谈超过 14 亿美元的米兰房地产销售，之后股价大涨
item.description: 据意大利《晚邮报》报道，开云集团正在洽谈以超过 13 亿欧元（14.3 亿美元）的价格向一家卡塔尔基金出售位于米兰的一栋大楼，随后开云集团股价在周四早盘交易中大涨 10.8%。【原文：Kering shares jumped 10.8% in early Thursday trading after Italian newspaper Corriere della Sera reported that the luxury group was in talks to sell a building in Milan to a Qatari fund for more than 1.3 billion euros ($1.43 billion).】

item.title: 受季节性因素影响，米其林第一季度销售额低于预期
item.description: 据周三晚些时候举行的投资者电话会议记录显示，由于 2025 年上半年的季节性因素比预期更严重，米其林预计其第一季度销售额将略低于市场预期。【原文：Michelin expects its first-quarter sales to be slightly below market consensus due to steeper than expected seasonality in the first half of 2025, according to the transcript of an investor call held late on Wednesday.】

item.title: 优衣库运营商 Fast Retailing 第二季度利润增长 33%，并上调业绩预期
item.description: 日本优衣库（Uniqlo）运营商周四表示，第二季度盈利飙升 33%，这是在美国征收进口关税给这家全球服装连锁店连续第四年创纪录盈利的目标蒙上阴影之前的最后一段平静时期。【原文：The Japanese operator of Uniqlo on Thursday said earnings soared 33% in its second quarter, the last period of calm before the U.S. imposition of import tariffs clouded the global clothing chain's aim for a fourth successive year of record profit.】
